title: Seven-Round NFL Mock Draft Breakdown (Football 04/21)
description:
RJ White joins Will Brinson to break down his seven-round NFL Mock draft on CBSSports.com. They look at whether the Cowboys should go wide receiver or linebacker in the first round, debate whether the Jets made a mistake trading up to No. 3, question whether the Seahawks should keep trading down in the draft, wonder if the Dolphins can compete in the AFC East after hitting on three picks in this mock, figure out what the Vikings are doing, grade a huge haul for Bill Belichick and the Patriots and go over winners and losers in the draft.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
